title: National Youth Festival to be held soon; Mashhood
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 02 (APP): Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan, Chairman, the Prime Minister Youth Programme (PMYP) on Friday said that the National Youth Festival would be held soon to showcase the talent of future generation.
Talking to the Speaker of the Punjab Assembly Malik Ahmed Khan, he said all possible steps were taken to empower the youth as the future of Pakistan is in the hands of the talented and intelligent youth.
Rana Mashhood also apprised the speaker about the initiatives and programmes of PMYP.
Malik Ahmed on the occasion appreciated the efforts of Chairman PMYP for providing opportunities to the youth for a prosperous future.
